title: Ezreal q ap ratio is getting removed.
body: Why? I my self do not play ap ezreal but all you do with this is make ap ezreal be a thing if the past.

replies.body: They probably want to keep him out of mid lane
Because he is being played mid. And any time an adc ever leaves their lane rito must gut them into the dirt.

WAIT THEY ARE??? WHY?
He isnt the best ap midlaner he is terrible there, why are they doing this i mean, he is mainly played as an ADC, but i guess LC$
As far as I know, they do this to hit his double tear build, while trying not to hurt his AD build in the process.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=d6YycbGh,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-03-10T08:40:43.771+0000)
>
> As far as I know, they do this to hit his double tear build, while trying not to hurt his AD build in the process.

why, i love ap ez whats the point of his q then, this will literally gut him and he will be barely playable
if this is true im pretty  sure the reason behind it is to stop him from buying double {{item:3070}} which is really aids

they're moving the AP ratio to W, by increasing its AP ratio more. 

Q: AP RATIO 30% > 0%
W AP RATIO 70%-90% > 70%>130%

Overall his AP ratios will be higher.
Its still not worth. Ezreal w needed to be activated. And can be used way less. Ap ezreal is gone.
True, AP Ezreal will still probably be weaker simply for the fact that Q has a short CD and therefore is available more often than his W.
